metadata.dc:description: We report a girl with a chronic hepatitis caused by C virus diagnosed at the age of nine, unsuccessfully treated with interferon and ribavirine. Two years later, she was subjected to a liver transplantation. She maintained elevated viral loads with a normal pathological study of the liver until 22 months after transplantation. She was treated again with combined antiviral therapy, for 6 months, without response and experienced a progressive deterioration liver function, dying three years after transplantation.
metadata.dc:title: Hepatitis crónica y cirrosis por virus C pre y post trasplante hepático en una niña de 9 años.
[Chronic hepatitis and cirrhosis caused by C virus before and after liver transplantation. Report of one case].
